colorNames - Static variable in class sim.ColorParameter
 
ColorParameter - Class in sim
ColorParameter extends Parameter to implement functionality to store a parameter with a Color object as its value.
ColorParameter(String, String[], boolean) - Constructor for class sim.ColorParameter
Creates a ColorParameter given a name for the parameter, a String array of possible color names and a boolean value to indicate whether or not the parameter is adjustable during running of the simulation.
colors - Static variable in class sim.ColorParameter
 
ColorSimParameter - Class in sim
ColorSimParameter is a wrapper class for ColorParameter, to be used as a simulation parameter.
ColorSimParameter(String, String[], boolean) - Constructor for class sim.ColorSimParameter
Creates a ColorSimParameter given a name for the parameter, a String array of possible color names and a boolean value to indicate whether or not the parameter is adjustable during running of the simulation.
colorToString(Color) - Static method in class sim.ColorParameter
Converts a Color object to its String name.
